alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 08 at 12:29AM CDT until July 08 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Crooked Creek Near Englewood affecting Meade County. For the Crooked Creek...including Englewood...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Crooked Creek Near Englewood. * WHEN...Until this morning. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Prepare for minor overflows along portions of crooked creek in southern meade county as the creek moves out onto the floodplain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 6.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 6.5 feet early this morning. - Flood stage is 6.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.5 feet on 10/12/1949. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 700 AM CDT.
